text: Del Ponte is a surname. It belongs to an Italian noble family, hailing from Rome and Naples. Notable people with this surname include: * Ajla Del Ponte (born 1996), Swiss sprinter * Amalia Del Ponte (born 1936), Italian artist and designer * Carla Del Ponte (born 1947), Swiss lawyer and former Chief Prosecutor of two United Nations international criminal law tribunals == References == Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Del Ponte
